reference.title: MME support for locally configured S-GW/P-GW selection based on IMSI/MSISDN range for inbound roamers (Feature f12208-02): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature supports the selection of the locally configured S-GW/P-GW for the inbound roamers based on IMSI/MSISDN range plus APN. This feature builds upon S-GW/P-GW selection based on IMSI/MSISDN range (Feature f10110-01) for home subscribers only.

table.title: MME support for locally configured S-GW/P-GW selection based on IMSI/MSISDN range for inbound roamers: feature summary

entry.ph: S-GW/P-GW selection based on IMSI/MSISDN range (Feature f10110-01)
